name: Crockett Electrics
address: Serves the Los Angeles area and Southern California. (Specific address not publicly listed for service area.)
description: A Black-owned electrical services company with over 25 years of experience, specializing in residential, commercial, and industrial electrical work, including recessed lighting, exterior lighting, and landscape lighting

name: RBT Electric, Inc.
address: Orange County, California. (Specific address not publicly listed.)
description: A minority-owned (African American), SBA 8(a), Service Disabled Veteran Small Business (SDVOSB), and HUBZone Certified Contractor established in 2008. They offer turnkey electrical engineering and construction services, including design-build solar, multi-family, military, and public works electrical projects

name: Jess Electric
address: Serves the Greater Sacramento Region. (Specific address not publicly listed.)
description: A local, Black-owned electrical contracting company serving residential properties and small businesses. Founded in 2018, the owner also focuses on training and encouraging young people interested in becoming electricians

name: YOUNGBLOOD ELECTRIC COMPANY
description: Offers commercial and residential electrical services

name: Bartholomew Lighting
description: An award-winning, Black-owned architectural lighting design and consulting firm that helps clients design, specify, and commission sustainable, healthy, and cost-effective lighting systems

name: Black Whale Home Lighting & Furniture Store
address: Encinitas, California. (Specific showroom address not provided in search results, but the store is located in Encinitas.)
description: A lighting and home decor store with over 30 years of experience in San Diego, specializing in lighting fixtures and home decor. They offer online shopping and have a showroom in Encinitas

name: Stephanie Johnson (Lighting Designer)
address: California (Practices in Los Angeles). (Specific address not publicly listed.)
description: One of very few professional Black lighting designers in California, with experience dating back to 1974, specializing in theatre and architectural lighting design

name: Lumenal Lighting
address: Mountlake Terrace, WA (Serves the Pacific Northwest, but may have California clients or reach)
description: A minority-owned commercial lighting and electrical contractor specializing in high-efficiency LED upgrades, retrofits, lighting design, and repair services for commercial, government, and educational clients

name: Lighting Aura
description: Offers a showroom for residential decorative and commercial lighting needs, including lighting controls and shading solutions

name: Courtesy Lighting
address: La Crescenta, CA. (Specific address not publicly listed.)
